programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are having a “clown day” and everyone is going to play at being clowns. Noddy shows Fuse his smelling flower joke but Fuse realises he isn't programmed to understand clowning. The clowning goes too far when someone sets up a bucket of balls joke that almost causes an accident. Noddy needs to investigate to find out who is the unfunny clown before a ‘joke' goes too far. Using all his detecting skills and reconsidering evidence, Noddy works out that the unfunny clown is actually Fuse! He didn't realise that the clowning jokes he was playing on the other toys weren't actually funny! Noddy shows Fuse a way in which he can join in with the clowning in a safe way and Clown Day can go ahead after all. Well done Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: The Reflesherator When Professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers for the job. Master Blister The students of Scare School are thrilled after a prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are having a “clown day” and everyone is going to play at being clowns. Noddy shows Fuse his smelling flower joke but Fuse realises he isn't programmed to understand clowning. The clowning goes too far when someone sets up a bucket of balls joke that almost causes an accident. Noddy needs to investigate to find out who is the unfunny clown before a ‘joke' goes too far. Using all his detecting skills and reconsidering evidence, Noddy works out that the unfunny clown is actually Fuse! He didn't realise that the clowning jokes he was playing on the other toys weren't actually funny! Noddy shows Fuse a way in which he can join in with the clowning in a safe way and Clown Day can go ahead after all. Well done Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)

programme.title: Rosalie 19: Reyna Ng Bocaue
programme.desc: For many years, Monette has raised her daughter on her earnings as a bold dancer. But now that she is old, she finds herself ousted as the club's main attraction. Instead, she finds out her daughter Rosalie (Ilonah Jean) is taking her place as queen of the girls joints. But, one by one, Rosalie's enemies are found dead including the corrupt club owner and Monette's lustful boyfriend.

programme.title: Tagos Ng Dugo
programme.desc: Is it only a coincidence that the murders seem to happen exactly on the days Pina is experiencing her very painful monthly period?

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang

programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice
programme.desc: Alice roasts up some spuds for much loved music journalist and TV presenter Zan Rowe. Zan confides in Alice her fear of cooking lamb and together they combine Zan's love of Italian cuisine with lamb.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the week's journalism.

programme.title: Movin' To The Country
programme.desc: The team heads to the Top End where local Territorians are creating pathways to employment for Indigenous youth. Halina investigates an astonishing bit of kit and Craig rides along with an innovative tour company.

programme.title: Dream Gardens
programme.desc: Sarah-Jane and Luke dream of a life on the land in country New South Wales. But their plans for a productive bush tucker garden are hampered by their lack of funds and expertise.

programme.title: Art Works
programme.desc: We meet 11-year-old Luca French, the youngest ever artist to exhibit at Vivid Sydney. Namila Benson talks to author and artist Amani Haydar about art, grief and healing, and we check out a new direct-to-collector art market.

programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, our shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Patricia Karvelas asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.desc: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When the blood-smeared car of 27-year-old Stefanie Watson is found in a Maryland parking lot, her family holds out hope she's still alive.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On the evening of 23rd April 2004, doting father-of-two Robin Chard is making his way home from a quiet night out with friends when his life is cruelly cut short by two men looking for trouble.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer and the atrocities in the facility are revealed.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A traveling nurse is pulled over for a traffic violation in New Mexico and is arrested for felony burglary carried out in her home state of Ohio. Is she a thug for hire or innocent with a rock-solid alibi?

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: After a 20-year-old man is crushed by a truck that fell off its jack, the victim's father is brought in to face questions over whether it was really an accident or murder.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a 911 call about cold fries leads to an arrest for murder; a fugitive is caught on the toilet; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A man hangs on the hood of his car while his ex-girlfriend drives it on the highway. An intoxicated woman flees from airport police on a motorised suitcase; and more.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Nurse Susan Fortune moves to Albany for a fresh start after being involved in a relationship of domestic abuse. She matches with Jake Embert. The pair hit it off and the relationship moves quickly.

programme.desc: Undercover agent Jerry Speziale's career shifts after a bullet; Agent Ed Newcomer probes hawk killings in California.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: Le Pacte
programme.desc: The anonymous vandal has managed to get hold of the pact and suggests a truce. Aïna, Theo and Arnaud try harder than ever to find out who's behind the mask.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette
programme.desc: On the menu: barbecued mackerel fillets, virgin tomato, pepperonata with pine nuts and dried raisons as a starter. Today's discovery: traditional fruit beers, made in Aigle and exported as far afield as Japan.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean
programme.desc: Its appearances and spectacular jumps never fail to fascinate. In Polynesia, researchers, islanders, and tour operators share their relationship with dolphins and their protective efforts. From Rangiroa to Moorea, a dive with the beautiful cetacean.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'amour D'une Femme
programme.desc: Marie Prieur, a young doctor, takes up a post on Ouessant Island. Quickly adopted by the inhabitants, she becomes friends with the school teacher. When she falls in love with a young engineer, Andre Lorenzi, he quickly makes it clear that she must choose between marriage and her profession.

programme.title: En Piste !
programme.desc: Pauline is the witness at her best friend's wedding and hopes to take advantage of this special day to get closer to the handsome Raphael. But she finds it hard to let her gaze stray from her handicapped daughter, Emma, who she didn't want to leave with a childminder.

programme.title: C'etait Pas Du Bourgogne
programme.desc: Between two phone calls, a grandfather recounts his memories from when he was 20 and from the war.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Rosa Wilder is back in Oberwies. She's left the police force but temporarily returns to active service to investigate a policeman's murder. Apparently the victim was policing an argument in the village bar. Did this cost him his life? During her investigations, Rosa encounters someone familiar: Manfred Kägi...

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Rosa Wilder has identified two suspects in the policeman's murder. The short-tempered Elias and the craftsmen Zingg are involved in mysterious death. The Räbers, victims of blackmail, are unaware that their accountant is in league with the blackmailer.

programme.title: Le Crime Lui Va Si Bien
programme.desc: Gaby is technical advisor on the film set of a crime series, which leads to a somewhat eventful meeting with her ex-husband Antoine, who she hasn't seen in ten years. When a body is found on a rubbish tip, reality becomes stranger than fiction. Particularly as Antoine knew the victim...

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Amongst the artisans of fashion, there are the all-essential: Thomasine and Langlois-Martin; those who never give up: Alexandra Latour, producer of Calais lace; those who embody the future: stu-dents at the French Fashion Institute and Marco Ward; and those impossible to categorize: Tzuri Gueta and Michel Carel.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Les etoiles De L'Ombre : Michel Mallory
programme.desc: A little-known songwriter, Michel Mallory is behind many of France's greatest popular hits. He recounts the story of his life and career, through that of his childhood in Corsica, his unique way of composing, his partnerships with Johnny Hallyday, Sylvie Vartan, Michel Sardou, Claude FranCois, Jeane Manson...

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: With his head in the stars and his feet on the ground, meet Emmanuel Jehin, an astrophysicist who has set up base camp at the Oukaïmeden observatory. Meet also with Frederic Ramelot, who shows Adrien his inn in the village of Imlil, at the foot of Toubkal.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean
programme.desc: In Polynesia, sailing is one of the most practiced water sports, alongside surfing and the very popular Va'a. In Tahiti, competitions and regattas are regularly held across all age groups and boat categories.

programme.title: Louis Et La Faune Urbaine
programme.desc: Louis and Travis leave their usual territory to help a client suffering from a serious bat invasion, and someone else waging a war against wasps.

programme.title: Faire Oeuvre Utile
programme.desc: You will never listen to the song ''Quand on est en amour'' in the same way after having heard the story of Monique, a survivor of the Rwanda genocide, and of that of Patrick Norman. ''L'enfant Mascara'', a novel by Simon Boulerice, had a salutary effect on 17-year-old Elliott.

programme.title: Les Mots De La Paix
programme.desc: Crises, coups, wars, transnational threats, outside interference, global warming: the stability of Africa and the safety of the civil populations are in danger. Via twenty words, the political scientist Niagale Bagayoko analyses the current security challenges and dynamics.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes
programme.desc: Journey to Bugey, discovering the land of Cerdon. This sparkling wine, white or rose, is made of fine bubbles and ancestral know-how unique to the region.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.desc: Louis and Travis leave their usual territory to help a client suffering from a serious bat invasion, and someone else waging a war against wasps.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs !
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter. // Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's suspicious new neighbors.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes her apartment building were a luxury hotel for a sleepover, but finds herself too busy to enjoy it with friends. // When Hazel's wish for 1,500 minutes of fame angers Principal Krentz, she must find a way to speed up time.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force and Captain Man are called to Paris to protect France's national treasures, Bose is accidentally left alone to try and stop The Toddler from breaking into The Man's Nest.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When a tax loophole allows Dr. Minyak to buy the Man's Nest, Captain Man must stand his ground and live with his terrible new roommate while Danger Force tries to find a way to reverse the sale before they lose the Man's Nest for good.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe transform into them to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Henry uses his new super power to compete in a Dodge-A-Leen tournament, Ray, Schwoz, and Charlotte go undercover to teach Henry a lesson.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When the Lair floods, April goes to save Splinter... but he won't leave the sewer! To make matters worse, the mutant called GOLDFIN comes with a warning... stay out of his way, or else!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap. // SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. // After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes he's developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When the circus comes to town and steals his customers away, Mr. Krabs tries to sabotage the show. // Sandy spends the day solving everyone's issues, only to return home to her own monster of a problem.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When the Lair floods, April goes to save Splinter... but he won't leave the sewer! To make matters worse, the mutant called GOLDFIN comes with a warning... stay out of his way, or else!

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Draculaura, Clawdeen & Frankie meet Twyla, a boogey monster, while having a sleepover in the library. // Frankie, fascinated by Kuma's scaritage, does a ritual unsupervised causing trouble for all Monster High's undead students!

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Oliver remembers it is Dottie's birthday and rushes to prepare a celebration for her, while Anika and Jasmyn head into the tunnels to find the missing piece of the Oscillator. The Hunters finally get to the bottom of the Jacksons' disappearance.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Charlie Dylan must convince the crew that a new kid on the block may not be who he says he is. Myles finds out that honesty is the best policy.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The teens find Uncle Charlie's cassette tape about seeking a crystal in a Hidden Crypt... but the tape gets damaged before they hear the end. They find the crypt, but must survive its many traps by deciphering cryptic messages.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
